alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 20 at 4:30PM EDT until October 20 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL YORK...SOUTHERN CHEROKEE AND NORTHERN UNION COUNTIES... At 430 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Gaffney to 9 miles southeast of Spartanburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Union, Monarch Mill, Buffalo, Jonesville, Sharon, Hickory Grove, Thicketty, Saratt, Adamsburg, and York. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
